long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TL;DR: 

Format emails with a single click, while Promailer selects the perfect tone for you—whether professional, enthusiastic, or assertive. 
Get instant reply suggestions for incoming emails and choose the response that resonates with you. 
No ChatGPT keys required!

DETAILED VERSION

Are you tired of spending valuable time crafting emails every day? Do you struggle with finding the right tone or worrying about grammar and etiquette? Say goodbye to email headaches and say hello to ProMailer AI, the ultimate solution for both email writers and responders.

For Busy Email Writers:

If you find yourself writing numerous emails daily, ProMailer AI is your secret weapon. Powered by the cutting-edge ChatGPT API, this extension takes care of formatting your emails effortlessly. Simply enter the basic contents of your message, and let ProMailer AI handle the rest. No more second-guessing if your email sounds professional, friendly, or assertive—ProMailer AI automatically analyzes the context and crafts the perfect tone for you. However, if you prefer, you can easily customize the tone to suit your specific needs.

For Swift Email Responders:

If you're constantly inundated with incoming emails, ProMailer AI has your back. It provides you with instant reply suggestions, saving you precious time and mental energy. With a wide range of response options, you can select the one that resonates with you and aligns with your communication style. Once you choose a suggestion, ProMailer AI expands upon it, helping you provide detailed and thoughtful responses effortlessly.

No ChatGPT Keys Required (Unless You Want Them):

ProMailer AI is designed to be hassle-free. For light users, there's no need to enter any ChatGPT keys. The extension works seamlessly without any additional setup. However, if you're a power user or an enterprise looking to streamline email workflows across your team, reach out to us. We offer key-sharing options for enhanced collaboration and productivity.

We're Here to Help:

Have questions or need assistance? Our dedicated ProMailer AI dashboard is at your service. Head over to our platform, and our friendly support team is just a click away in the live chat. We're committed to ensuring your email experience is seamless, efficient, and personalized.
Simplify your email life with ProMailer AI. Try it today and experience the joy of stress-free email communication.
